name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Advanced smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, and water resistance. Monitor your fitness goals and stay connected on the go.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Elegant genuine leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap. Spacious interior with multiple compartments for your essentials.

name: Running Sneakers
description: Comfortable running shoes with cushioned sole and breathable mesh upper. Ideal for daily workouts and long-distance running.

name: Ceramic Coffee Set
description: Beautiful handcrafted ceramic coffee set including 4 mugs and a coffee pot. Perfect for your morning routine or entertaining guests.

name: Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Sleek design that complements any workspace.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort. Eco-friendly material, easy to clean and carry.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and long battery life. Compatible with all major operating systems.

name: Cotton T-Shirt Pack
description: Pack of 3 premium cotton t-shirts in various colors. Soft, breathable fabric with comfortable fit for everyday wear.

name: Indoor Plant Set
description: Set of 3 low-maintenance indoor plants with decorative pots. Bring nature indoors and purify your air naturally.

name: Dumbbell Set
description: Adjustable dumbbell set with weights from 5 to 25 lbs. Perfect for home workouts and strength training.

name: Backpack Travel
description: Durable travel backpack with laptop compartment and multiple pockets. Water-resistant material, perfect for adventures.
